recommendations.title: Implement Centralized Error Handling
recommendations.description: Introduce shared error-handling utilities and refactor high-risk functions to wrap asynchronous calls with try/catch and structured error propagation.

recommendations.title: Enforce Input Validation Contracts
recommendations.description: Adopt schema-based validation (e.g., Zod/JSON Schema) for file-system and external data entry points before processing inputs.

recommendations.title: Expand Automated Test Coverage
recommendations.description: Prioritize test authoring for untested modules to protect critical mission tools and domain utilities; target >95% coverage for high-touch modules.

recommendations.title: Declare Explicit Return Types
recommendations.description: Document and annotate all exported API functions with explicit return types to improve IntelliSense and guard against implicit any types.

recommendations.title: Standardize API Naming
recommendations.description: Adopt a naming convention guide (PascalCase for classes, camelCase for functions) and lint rules to enforce it.

recommendations.title: Replace Synchronous IO Operations
recommendations.description: Switch fs.*Sync calls to async equivalents and pipeline operations to prevent event-loop blocking in mission execution.

recommendations.title: Optimize Nested Loop Hotspots
recommendations.description: Profile nested loops in dependency resolvers and quality analyzers; refactor to use memoization or set lookups.

recommendations.title: Eliminate Dangerous Security Patterns
recommendations.description: Audit eval/command usage and replace with safe alternatives or parameterized APIs; add ESLint security plugin to prevent regressions.

recommendations.title: Repair Documentation Links
recommendations.description: Validate relative documentation links and add automated link checking in CI.

recommendations.title: Fill Documentation Gaps
recommendations.description: Add Overview, Usage, API, and Installation sections to onboarding docs to reduce ramp-up time.

recommendations.title: Retire Temporary Workarounds
recommendations.description: Track workaround hotspots in backlog, convert to permanent solutions, and codify acceptance criteria.

recommendations.title: Repair Domain Pack Definitions
recommendations.description: Resolve missing metadata or parse errors in domain YAML files to keep mission packs discoverable.

recommendations.title: Improve Coverage Hotspots
recommendations.description: Raise line coverage from 94.9% to >=95% focusing on low-covered tools like export-template and score-quality.

recommendations.title: Introduce Performance Profiling in CI
recommendations.description: Add lightweight benchmarks for mission planning flows and fail builds on regressions >10%.

recommendations.title: Automate Documentation Generation
recommendations.description: Generate API docs from TypeScript annotations using TypeDoc to keep reference in sync with code.
